biotools.summary: Template-based predictor of RNA secondary structure. It takes a template RNA secondary structure(s) and a query RNA sequence(s) and generates secondary structure of the query sequence(s) using the provided structure(s) as a template(s). Biological reliability of the generated structures is evaluated in form of z-scores.

bioschemas.name: cpPredictor
bioschemas.summary: Template-based predictor of RNA secondary structure. It takes a template RNA secondary structure(s) and a query RNA sequence(s) and generates secondary structure of the query sequence(s) using the provided structure(s) as a template(s). Biological reliability of the generated structures is evaluated in form of z-scores.
